And <WG2532> Having Seen <WG1492> That <WG3754> Pleasing <WG701> It Is <WG2076> To The <WG3588> Jews <WG2453> He Added <WG4369> To Take <WG4815> Also <WG2532> Peter : <WG4074> and They <WG2258> Were <WG1161> Days <WG2250> Of Unleavened <WG3588> Bread : <WG106>

Whom <WG3739> Also <WG2532> Having Seized <WG4084> He Put <WG5087> In <WG1519> Prison, <WG5438> Having Delivered <WG3860> To Four <WG5064> Sets Of Four <WG5069> Soldiers <WG4757> To Guard <WG5442> Him, <WG846> Purposing <WG1014> After <WG3326> The <WG3588> Passover <WG3957> To Bring Out <WG321> Him <WG846> To The <WG3588> People. <WG2992>

<WG3588> Therefore <WG3303> Indeed <WG3767> Peter <WG4074> Was Kept <WG5083> In <WG1722> The <WG3588> Prison; <WG5438> <WG4335> But Prayer <WG1161> Was <WG2258> Fervent <WG1618> Made <WG1096> By <WG5259> The <WG3588> Assembly <WG1577> To <WG4314> <WG3588> God <WG2316> Concerning <WG5228> Him. <WG846>

<WG3753> But When <WG1161> Was About <WG3195> Him <WG846> To Bring Forth <WG4254> <WG3588> Herod, <WG2264> In <WG3588> That <WG3571> Night <WG1565> Was <WG2258> <WG3588> Peter <WG4074> Sleeping <WG2837> Between <WG3342> Two <WG1417> Soldiers, <WG4757> Bound <WG1210> With Chains <WG254> Two, <WG1417> Guards <WG5441> Also <WG5037> Before <WG4253> The <WG3588> Door <WG2374> Kept <WG5083> The <WG3588> Prison. <WG5438>

And <WG2532>, Behold, <WG2400> An Angel <WG32> Of The Lord <WG2962> Stood By, <WG2186> And <WG2532> A Light <WG5457> Shone <WG2989> In <WG1722> The <WG3588> Building. <WG3612> <WG3960> And Having Smitten <WG1161> The <WG3588> Side <WG4125> Of <WG3588> Peter <WG4074> Roused Up <WG1453> He Him, <WG846>, Saying, <WG3004> Rise Up <WG450> In <WG1722> Haste. <WG5034> And <WG2532> Fell Off <WG1601> Of Him <WG846> The <WG3588> Chains <WG254> From His <WG1537> <WG3588> Hands. <WG5495>

<WG2036> And Said <WG5037> The <WG3588> Angel <WG32> To <WG4314> Him, <WG846> Gird Thyself About. <WG4024> And <WG2532> Bind On <WG5265> <WG3588> <WG4547> Thy Sandals. <WG4675> He Did <WG4160> And <WG1161> So, <WG3779> And <WG2532> He Says <WG3004> To Him, <WG846> Cast About <WG4016> Thee <WG3588> Garment, <WG2440> Thy <WG4675> And <WG2532> Follow <WG190> Me. <WG3427>

And <WG2532> Going Forth <WG1831> He Followed <WG190> Him, <WG846> And <WG2532> Did Not <WG3756> Know <WG1492> That <WG3754> Real <WG227> It Is <WG2076> Which <WG3588> Is Happening <WG1096> By Means <WG1223> Of The <WG3588> Angel, <WG32> <WG1380> But Thought <WG1161> A Vision <WG3705> He Saw. <WG991>

<WG1330> And Having Passed Though <WG1161> A First <WG4413> Guard <WG5438> And <WG2532> A Second, <WG1208> They Came <WG2064> To <WG1909> The <WG3588> Gate <WG4439> <WG3588> Iron <WG4603> That <WG3588> Leads <WG5342> Into <WG1519> The <WG3588> City, <WG4172> Which <WG3748> Of Itself <WG844> Opened <WG455> To Them; <WG846> And <WG2532> Having Gone Out <WG1831> They Went On Through <WG4281> Street <WG4505> <WG1520> And <WG2532> Immediately <WG2112> Departed <WG868> The <WG3588> Angel <WG32> ' From <WG575> Him. <WG846>

And <WG2532> <WG3588> Peter <WG4074> Having Come <WG1096> To <WG1722> Himself <WG1438> Said, <WG2036> Now <WG3568> I Know <WG1492> Of A Truth <WG230> That <WG3754> Sent Forth <WG1821> The Lord <WG2962> <WG3588> Angel, <WG32> His <WG846> And <WG2532> Delivered <WG1807> Me <WG3165> Out Of The <WG1537> Hand <WG5495> Of Herod <WG2264> And <WG2532> All <WG3956> The <WG3588> Expectation <WG4329> Of The <WG3588> People <WG2992> Of The <WG3588> Jews. <WG2453>

<WG4894> And Considering It <WG5037> He Came <WG2064> To <WG1909> The <WG3588> House <WG3614> Of Mary <WG3137> The <WG3588> Mother <WG3384> Of John <WG2491> Who <WG3588> Is Surnamed <WG1941> Mark, <WG3138> Where <WG3757> Were <WG2258> Many <WG2425> Gathered Together <WG4867> And <WG2532> Praying. <WG4336>

<WG2925> And Having Knocked <WG1161> <WG3588> Peter <WG4074> At The <WG3588> Door <WG2374> Of The <WG3588> Porch, <WG4440> Came <WG4334> A Damsel <WG3814> To Listen, <WG5219> By Name <WG3686> Rhoda; <WG4498>

And <WG2532> Having Recognized <WG1921> The <WG3588> Voice <WG5456> <WG3588> Of Peter, <WG4074> From <WG575> <WG3588> Joy <WG5479> She <WG3756> Opened Not <WG455> The <WG3588> Porch, <WG4440> Having Run In <WG1532> But <WG1161> She Reported <WG518> To Be Standing <WG2476> <WG3588> Peter <WG4074> Before <WG4253> The <WG3588> Porch. <WG4440>

But <WG3588> They <WG1161> To <WG4314> Her <WG846>, Said, <WG2036> Thou Art Mad. <WG3105> But <WG3588> She <WG1161> Strongly Affirmed <WG1340> Thus <WG3779> It Was. <WG2192> <WG3588> ' And They <WG1161> Said, <WG3004> The <WG3588> Angel <WG32> Of Him <WG846> It Is. <WG2076>
<WG3588> But <WG1161> Peter <WG4074> Continued <WG1961> Knocking : <WG2925> <WG455> And Having Opened <WG1161> They Saw <WG1492> Him, <WG846> And <WG2532> Were Amazed. <WG1839>

<WG2678> And Having Made A Sign <WG1161> To Them <WG846> With The <WG3588> Hand <WG5495> To Be Silent <WG4601> He Related <WG1334> To Them <WG846> How <WG4459> The <WG3588> Lord <WG2962> Him <WG846> Brought <WG1806> Out Of <WG1537> The <WG3588> Prison. <WG5438> <WG2036> And He Said, <WG1161> Report <WG518> To James <WG2385> And <WG2532> To The <WG3588> Brethren <WG80> These Things. <WG5023> And <WG2532> Having Gone Out <WG1831> He Went <WG4198> To <WG1519> Another <WG2087> Place. <WG5117>

<WG1096> And Having Come <WG1161> Day <WG2250> There Was <WG2258> Disturbance <WG5017> No <WG3756> Small <WG3641> Among <WG1722> The <WG3588> Soldiers, <WG4757> What <WG5101> Then Of <WG687> <WG3588> Peter <WG4074> Was Become. <WG1096>

Herod <WG2264> And <WG1161> Having Sought After <WG1934> Him <WG846> And <WG2532> Not <WG3361> Having Found, <WG2147> Having Examined <WG350> The <WG3588> Guards <WG5441> He Commanded Them <WG2753> To Be Led Away To Death <WG520> And <WG2532> Having Gone Down <WG2718> From <WG575> <WG3588> Judea <WG2449> To <WG1519> <WG3588> Caesarea <WG2542> He Stayed There. <WG1304>

Was <WG2258> And <WG1161> <WG3588> Herod <WG2264> In Bitter Hostility <WG2371> With The Tyrians <WG5183> And <WG2532> Sidonians; <WG4606> <WG3661> But With One Accord <WG1161> They Came <WG3918> To <WG4314> Him, <WG846> And <WG2532> Having Gained <WG3982> Blastus <WG986> Who Was <WG3588> Over <WG1909> The <WG3588> Bedchamber <WG2846> Of The <WG3588> King, <WG935> Sought <WG154> Peace, <WG1515> Because <WG1223> <WG3588> Was Nourished <WG5142> Their <WG846> <WG3588> Country <WG5561> By <WG575> The <WG3588> King's. <WG937>

<WG5002> And On A Set <WG1161> Day <WG2250> <WG3588> Herod <WG2264> Having Put On <WG1746> Apparel <WG2066> Royal, <WG937> And <WG2532> Having Sat <WG2523> On <WG1909> The <WG3588> Tribunal, <WG968> Was Making An Oration <WG1215> To <WG4314> Them. <WG846>
And <WG3588> The <WG1161> People <WG1218> Were Crying Out, <WG2019> Of A God The <WG2316> Voice <WG5456> And <WG2532> Not <WG3756> Of A Man! <WG444>

<WG3916> And Immediately <WG1161> Smote <WG3960> Him <WG846> An Angel <WG32> Of The Lord, <WG2962> <WG473> Because <WG3739> He <WG3756> Gave Not <WG1325> The <WG3588> Glory <WG1391> To <WG3588> God, <WG2316> And <WG2532> Having Been <WG1096> Eaten Of Worms <WG4662> He Expired. <WG1634>
But <WG3588> The <WG1161> Word <WG3056> Of <WG3588> God <WG2316> Grew <WG837> And <WG2532> Multiplied. <WG4129>

<WG921> And Barnabas <WG1161> And <WG2532> Saul <WG4569> Returned <WG5290> From <WG1537> Jerusalem, <WG2419> Having Fulfilled <WG4137> The <WG3588> Ministration, <WG1248> Having Taken With <WG4838> Them Also <WG2532> John <WG2491> Who <WG3588> Was Surnamed <WG1941> Mark. <WG3138>
